name: Nicole Barrett
text: I have been eating here for 35 years and never got a bad pizza. They did change to less sauce so I just ask for more. I always ask for extra sauce with sticks and they never charge. There is always a coupon or deal too. My one complaint was …More

text: It's good BECAUSE THERE IS ZERO WAIT ZERO CUSTOMERS AND ZERO ORDERS!! I'M SURE THERE WILL BE PLENTY AND I DO MEAN PLENTY OF PARKING SPACE!! SO COME ON DOWN NOOOOOW !!

text: First and last time ever coming to this location. The girl at the front greeting area was very rude. We are a group of 5, she gave us 3 plates and 2 sets of silverware. Didn't bring us any napkins. We ordered boneless chicken and asked if …More

text: Always yummy! Reasonably priced, friendly staff. Would recommend to a friend!

name: Damon Miller
text: We order from them on a regular basis because we love the pasta and their pizza.  However at least 50% of the time the orders are wrong.  We get pizza and no pasta or pasta and no pizza.  Calling down to complain does no good they just …More

text: Only been there once, but nothing really bad to say.

text: My daughter and I went in a month ago, our server sat us at a dirty table from the lunch rush and then took 10 minutes just to greet us with drinks. We were the only customers in the building. We had no silverware so we took it off another …More

text: Great manager and team. Took care of everything I wanted and made me feel welcomed.

text: If i could give this place nothing I would. First night, order was over an hour late and cold. Was credited for the pizza but not the rest of the food. Tried to apply the credit and had to contact the store personally and spoke to the …More

text: Online order was over an hour late and cold and very soggy. It was disgusting. Was not happy at all

text: I have been to this pizza hut for 20 or so years. I can honestly say today was the last time I will ever go there. This pizza hut used to take pride in there restaurant, now it is a joke!!!! Absolutely filthy no pride. Pizza hut as a …More

text: I order delivery from this pizza hut every 6-8 weeks or so, and me and my wife hit the lunxh buffet once in a while. The staff is professional and friendly. I stopped in for take out tonight which i mever do but im so glad i did. The …More

text: Waiting half an hour in store after arriving 25 minutes after ordering.  Went back up and asked eta and told at least 20 more minutes!!!!  What!!!!!!   This is crazy.   Others waiting forever also.  Very understaffed!

text: Words can't describe how awful this place is. I hope it gets hit with an asteroid, in the middle of the night, so no one gets hurt.
